GisIPoint
GetOrdinates
GetPosition
GetPositionByMembers

virtual GISGEOM_API void GisIPoint::GetPositionByMembers (  double *  x,
double *  y,
double *  z,
double *  m,
GisInt32 *  dimensionality
)  const [pure virtual]
 

Gets the position of this point Geometry, by values of its member data. This is in aid of higher performance for any implementation that does not internally use GisIDirectPosition objects for storage, or for an application seeking to avoid overhead of accessor methods.

Parameters:
x Output X ordinate value.
y Output Y ordinate value.
z Output Z ordinate value.
m Output M ordinate value.
dimensionality Output Dimensionality of ordinates in this position.
Returns:
Returns nothing
Comments or suggestions? Send us feedback.
